name: Deliverun
description:
:
Run, jump and use the power ups against your opponents to deliver the package. Play on the same couch and run as fast as you can! 

You can still be friends after playing this game... Maybe.

KEY FEATURES:

  • Finish the track or eliminate every opponent to win the round!
  • Local multiplayer from 2 to 4 players. Race against your friends sitting on the same couch!
  • You could lose all of your friends
  • Choose between 4 different characters
  • Procedural level creation system
  • 6 fantastic power ups to annoy your friends. Throw cans and bombs and swap yourself with your opponents in amazing photo finishes!
  • Xinput controllers are supported so well theyíre the only way to play the game. Keep it in mind!

DEVELOPED BY: 

FELIX FELICIS (EVENT HORIZON SCHOOL TURIN, YEAR 1 - 2017/2018)

GAME DESIGN:
* Samuele Castello
* Davide Cavuoto

PROGRAMMING:

* Dario Amendolito

CONCEPT ART:

* Oscar Burigana
* Chiara Di Palma

SOUNDTRACK:
* Giordano De Biase (djJM)
